titleInfo.title: Weak approximation of G-expectation with discrete state space

mods.abstract: We refine the discretization of G-expectation by Y. Dolinsky, M. Nutz, and M. Soner (Stochastic Processes and their Applications, 122 (2012), 664{675 ), in order to obtain a discretization of sublinear expectation where the martingale laws are defined on a finite lattice rather than the whole set of reals.
